remarks: Replacing a nested consequent.  A sort of modus ponens in antecedent position.  (Contributed by Wolf Lammen, 20-Sep-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
wl-mps.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
wl-mps.2 $e |- ( ( ph -> ch ) -> th ) $.
wl-mps $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> th ) $.
